text: Stanislas Guerini is a French politician who serves as Minister in the government of successive Prime Ministers Élisabeth Borne and Gabriel Attal since 2022.Stanislas Guerini Before entering government, Guerini served as executive officer of La République En Marche! (LREM) since 2018. From 2017 to 2022, Guerini was a member of the National Assembly.Stanislas Guerini, fidèle de Macron, fait son entrée au gouvernement Stanislas Guerini graduated from HEC Paris in 2006.Stanislas Guerini == References == Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
title: Stanislas Guerini
